titles.title: God Is God And He Always Will Be God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God is God and He always will be God.
God is god and He always will be God.
He's God when the lightning flashes.
He's God when the thunder rolls.
He's God way up in heaven,
And He's God down in my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God is God and He always will be God.
God is God and He always will be God.
He's God in the fiery furnace.
He's God in the lion's den.
He's God of all creation,
And He's God in the hearts of men.
